reviewText: My grandchildren loved this.  Educational too.  Even the three year old has learned from this movie.

our 2 yro son is crazy about firefighters and police officers and all that goes with them... He LOVES this video.... lots of exciting fire fighter action and safety info with out being too scary for a toddler... The only thing my husband and I thought was cheesy is the "talking" dalmatians... they don't seem to like they are talking at all... but my son doesn't mind he loves uncle smokey and little rascal....
